2ND SESSION: HOW TO COPE WITH COLLECTIVE GRIEF AND UNCERTAINTY

In light of the current crisis unfolding in Lebanon, The Lighthouse Arabia are offering a second session TODAY, at 12:30pm, UAE time online led by a trauma expert, Farah Dahabi. The session is designed to provide trauma-informed guidance and support for those impacted.

Register here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.lighthousearabia.com%252fevents%252fcrisis-lebanon-how-cope-collective-grief-uncertainty-and-emotional-pain-community-support-session-1%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXNB2xucfscq3n0o%252btR4ntT5Vke6z9hL%252f0WvEwFfsfWoNnbFt8P0uGRj0XMvl8Nlg2p5z9VvwiD8MoX8LTWm8QW7dJutf5l22TUbM3Y9XjL630KuVCx%252bsH2gUnva01Ap5mym0268bCmhQ%252bL6zn0u5jm3qdSK6g9HPIBxMl3tGL0X31%252bZctyJAki%252bX1bVywu%252fkpvuN%252bp%252foH%252fPHeGvFi0r0gkqANwNiQCZjioo9Ksn8GJI&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C58a8c99af4b944966d8308dcdec25511%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638630173471438447%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=tHFa9rUz4TSqV6cM7akLKpWVHEJs5S017EWo%2FgFYYV8%3D&reserved=0>

EXCLUSIVE CHRISTOFLE SALE

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SQFWtbsIzU-W0O-fZkZUWw/550434/49A7C7A9F1A2B33435A738BE0E2C379A/image-2024-09-26t230031-111.jpeg> 	
Enjoy an exceptional offer at Maison Christofle, exclusively for Chalhoub Group team members, from Friday 27th September to Sunday 29th September!

Shop with 70% off on photo frames, the Tourbillon collection and both the jewellery and small accessories collections.

SHOP NOW <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.christofle.com%252fexp_are%252fsale.html%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXNB2xucfscq3n0o%252btR4ntT5Vke6z9hL%252f0WvEwFfsfWoNnbFt8P0uGRj0XMvl8Nlg2p5z9VvwiD8MoX8LTWm8QW7dJutf5l22TUbM3Y9XjL630KuVCx%252bsH2gUnva01Ap5mym0268bCmhQ%252bL6zn0u5jm3qdSK6g9HPIBxMl3tGL0X31%252bZctyJAki%252bX1bVywu%252fkpvuN%252bp%252foH%252fPHeGvFi0r0gkqANwNiQCZjioo9Ksn8GJI&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C58a8c99af4b944966d8308dcdec25511%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638630173471460042%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=N%2BYSGTOYwHQHx8vuk%2FKviu7Eb%2FrAUgJ8MGwYLdqcto4%3D&reserved=0>

How to avail this offer:
- Create an account on the site with your Chalhoub Group or brand professional e-mail address
- Log in to your account (with your professional e-mail address)
- Add one of the products in this offer to your basket
- Enter the discount code CHALHOUB70 in the basket to see the discount applied automatically

In case of any support you can contact Christofle customer service on +33176278918 <http://tel:+33176278918>  or via the form - Contact-us - (christofle.com). <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252feur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com%252f%253furl%253dhttps%25253A%25252F%25252Fwww.christofle.com%25252Fexp_are%25252Fcontact%25252Fcontactus.html%2526data%253d05%25257C02%25257CYasmine.Uthman%252540chalhoub.com%25257Ca2e3f745bf8c465253b908dcde58a121%25257C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%25257C0%25257C0%25257C638629719462991627%25257CUnknown%25257CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%25253D%25257C0%25257C%25257C%25257C%2526sdata%253dAZGW3zrdv5wZ0LnlQDyjrsdh7CLFKiXjd2JDTVfsZDU%25253D%2526reserved%253d0%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXNB2xucfscq3n0o%252btR4ntT5Vke6z9hL%252f0WvEwFfsfWoNnbFt8P0uGRj0XMvl8Nlg2p5z9VvwiD8MoX8LTWm8QW7dJutf5l22TUbM3Y9XjL630KuVCx%252bsH2gUnva01Ap5mym0268bCmhQ%252bL6zn0u5jm3qdSK6g9HPIBxMl3tGL0X31%252bZctyJAki%252bX1bVywu%252fkpvuN%252bp%252foH%252fPHeGvFi0r0gkqANwNiQCZjioo9Ksn8GJI&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C58a8c99af4b944966d8308dcdec25511%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638630173471476541%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=McKUVW6aC7YbOpWwe00Ds48ymD6GMg6AxzW0RQpF%2BSo%3D&reserved=0>

T&Cs:
This offer is reserved for Chalhoub Group employees only.
Offer limited to the purchase of 5 products per employee.
The product purchased is for personal use only. It is strictly forbidden to resell the product 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SQFWtbsIzU-W0O-fZkZUWw/545369/5FD9BF3849624032F28FDFF959B024E4/nuggets-41.png> 	

THE GROUP SIGNS MOU WITH EMIRATI HUMAN RESOURCES DEVELOPMENT COUNCIL 

The Group signed an MoU with the Emirati Human Resources Development Council at Ru’ya Career Fair to empower Emiratisation in the private sector. This collaboration aims to enhance Emiratisation efforts across the private sector, reinforcing the commitment to integrating UAE nationals into various industries.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SQFWtbsIzU-W0O-fZkZUWw/550435/AFF5F2071F0130381EEF3AB1A408FDE3/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-53.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SQFWtbsIzU-W0O-fZkZUWw/544565/D0A16AB0334D873C70435BDA8B6ACE2B/nuggets-21.png> 	

MY BOLD FUTURE


 نحن المستقبل

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SQFWtbsIzU-W0O-fZkZUWw/550437/1961790C2F4F0823F7661542A85E281D/chalhoub-sports-day-10.gif> 	
Have you met Aaesha? Hear about her experience as a woman in leadership in her role as Senior Coordinator of Customer Service.

Check out more of Aaesha's story, <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.linkedin.com%252fposts%252fchalhoubgroup_wearechalhoub-myboldfuture-extraordinaryemiratiseveryday-activity-7245317978194366465-8eJi%253futm_source%253dshare%2526utm_medium%253dmember_desktop%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXNB2xucfscq3n0o%252btR4ntT5Vke6z9hL%252f0WvEwFfsfWoNnbFt8P0uGRj0XMvl8Nlg2p5z9VvwiD8MoX8LTWm8QW7dJutf5l22TUbM3Y9XjL630KuVCx%252bsH2gUnva01Ap5mym0268bCmhQ%252bL6zn0u5jm3qdSK6g9HPIBxMl3tGL0X31%252bZctyJAki%252bX1bVywu%252fkpvuN%252bp%252foH%252fPHeGvFi0r0gkqANwNiQCZjioo9Ksn8GJI&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C58a8c99af4b944966d8308dcdec25511%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638630173471493646%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=mfOVqkebl3%2Bg2YZ2lhzx%2FNBcNRgdANKRdHLnAbBEo7c%3D&reserved=0>  and refer extraordinary Emirati talents to join our Group!

L'OCCITANE, ELEMIS, ERBORIAN & SOL DE JANEIRO STAFF SALE

Enjoy up to 90% off on L'Occitane, Elemis, Erborian and Sol de Janeiro! 

Available exclusively for Group team members on 30th September and 1st October from 10am - 5pm at the L'Occitane D3 Office.

Cash payment only. T&Cs apply.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/SQFWtbsIzU-W0O-fZkZUWw/550405/44CBD79B954CCC48F8EF97F306A3F466/garage_sale.jpg>

FALL INTO THE SEASON IN STYLE

It's officially fall!

Transcend the changing temperatures with these wardrobe wins. It's time to refresh your wardrobe with our latest season trends. A refined and cozy elegance awaits you, focusing on natural tones, luxurious textures and fabrics, now available in-store at Tryano, Yas Mall.
